titleStmt.author: Fraunce, Abraham

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: To the Right excellent and most honorable Ladie, the La∣die Marie, Countesse of Pembroke.

monogr.title: The Arcadian rhetorike: or The præcepts of rhetorike made plaine by examples : Greeke, Latin, English, Italian, French, Spanish, out of Homers Ilias, and Odissea, Virgils Aeglogs, [...] and Aeneis, Sir Philip Sydnieis Arcadia, songs and sonets [...] By A. Fraunce
monogr.author: Fraunce, Abraham

div.head: To the Right excellent and most honorable Ladie, the Ladie Marie, Countesse of Pembroke.
div.l: VOi, pia nympha, tuum, quem tolse la morte, Philippū,
Italicum lumen, flowre of Fraunce, splendor Iberus,
Italicus Tasso, French Salust, Boscan Iberus,
〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 Virgil, 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 ,
Greekish Homer, tanto lati iunguntur 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 .

closer.signed: Your Honors most affectionate. Abraham Fraunce.
